title: ACRISFlight
description: The flight in stp app services

operatingAirline.description: The airline operating the flight. Either IATA or ICAO must be present

modelName.description: The model name of the aircraft

codeShares.description: The code-shares associated with the flight

departureAirport.description: The departure airport as IATA format

arrivalAirport.description: The arrival airport as IATA format

originDate.description: Date expressed in UTC. Time element is not used. This date MUST not change once initialized. For a flight SFO-DEN-LHR both flight legs SFO-DEN and DEN-LHR will have the origin date of the SFO departing date (example 2015-10-15).

departure.description: The departure infomation for the flight

arrival.description: The arrival information for the flight

via.description: A list of airports and the corresponding arrival and departure information for stops during the flight. The order in the array represents the flight order.

viaAirport.description: The via airport as IATA format

departure.description: The departure infomation for the flight

arrival.description: The arrival information for the flight
